activities.name: Sensory Play
activities.explanation: Create a sensory bin with rice, beans, or other textured materials for your baby to touch
activities.impact: Initiates texture Exploration and strengthenes motor skills

activities.name: Nursery Rhymes
activities.explanation: Sing nursery rhymes to infants with hand motions
activities.impact: Enhances memory and language skills

activities.name: Reading and Listening
activities.explanation: Read books to them with high-contrast images and textures
activities.impact: Stimulates Brain Development

activities.name: Arts and Crafts
activities.explanation:
Finger painting with non-toxic paints.
Creating collages with child-safe scissors and magazines
activities.impact: Development of brain and multisensory skills

activities.name: Playing with Clay or Playdough
activities.explanation: Building towers and structures with soft playdoh or clay
activities.impact: Enhances hand-eye coordination and creativity

activities.name: Storytelling
activities.explanation: Encourage your child to tell/explain a story using their toys or drawings
activities.impact: Facilitates hand movements, increases vocabulary skills, and stimulates imagination

activities.name: Tummy Time
activities.explanation: Putting colorful toys on their wrists or close to their eyes so that they try to move their body
activities.impact: Develops visual memory and keeps them engaged

activities.name: Baby Yoga
activities.explanation: A series of gentle movements and stretches for parents to perform with their babies
activities.impact: Encourages motor skills, coordination and flexibility

activities.name: Hiding and Finding Objects
activities.explanation: Cover coloful toys through blanket and play side and seek
activities.impact: Develops object permanence

activities.name: Snow Play
activities.explanation: During the snow season, enjoy building snowmen or snow angels
activities.impact: Sharpens mind and prevents cognitive decline

activities.name: Sorting and Matching
activities.explanation: Provide objects to sort and match by color, shape, size using cards, socks, or other safe objects available at home.
activities.impact: Helps toddlers to learn about early representation and problem solving

activities.name: Doing House Chores Together
activities.explanation: Involve your child in simple house chores tasks, like mixing or pouring ingredients
activities.impact: Builds higher self-esteem and makes them more responsible.

activities.name: Nature Walks and discovery
activities.explanation:
Take short walks in a stroller or baby carrier to introduce your baby to outdoor sights
Allow them to gently touch leaves, grass, and flowers while being in the nature
activities.impact: Encourages curiosity and fosters texture exploration

activities.name: Nature Scavenger Hunt
activities.explanation: Explore the backyard, local park, or a beach to find a list of items like leaves, rocks, seashells, rocks, or flowers
activities.impact: Boosts observation skills and helps toddlers develop early learning skills in a fun and natural way

activities.name: Nature Art and Craft
activities.explanation: Use items that can be collected from outdoor to create crafts
activities.impact: Development of brain and multisensory skills

activities.name: Riding a Tricycle
activities.explanation: Perform supervised bike ride adventures in safe areas
activities.impact: Develops physical strength and hand-eye coordination

activities.name: Board books
activities.explanation: Introduce board books as the small hands of your baby can manipulate the pages without ripping.
activities.impact: Improves your child's eyesight and nurtures optic development

activities.name: Educational Building Blocks and Puzzles
activities.explanation: Use high-contrast educational books with your baby.
activities.impact: Hones fine motor skills and prevents cognitive decline

activities.name: Age-appropriate media with coviewing
activities.explanation:
Introduce your child with only age-appropriate programs
Make sure to strictly follow the recommended duration.
activities.impact:
Makes it easier for your child to understand and make sense of what they're watching.
Helps with vocabulary expansion

activities.name: Baby Playdates
activities.explanation: Organize playdates with children of similar age
activities.impact: Promotes language Development and social interaction

activities.name: Baby Playdates
activities.explanation: Organize playdates with children of similar age
activities.impact: Promotes language Development and social interaction

activities.name: Interactive Toys
activities.explanation: Light up your playtime with our child using interactive toys with light and sound features.
activities.impact: Effective at commanding children's attention by activating their orienting reflex.

activities.name: Puppet Shows
activities.explanation: Create handmade puppets with your child and play with them through hand gestures.
activities.impact:
Helps with eye-hand coordination
Improves balance and directionality

activities.name: Easter Adventures
activities.explanation: Engage toddlers in easter egg hunt, counting and decorating eggs, easter story time or puzzle games
activities.impact:
Enhances problem-solving and observation skills.
Advances creativity, fine motor skills, and attention to details

activities.name: Celebrate Mother's Day
activities.explanation: Create a card or give them the photo albums to explore
activities.impact: Promotes creativity and fine motor skills, helps with recognition capabilities, nurtures awareness

activities.name: Celebrate Father's Day
activities.explanation: Create a card or give them the photo albums to explore
activities.impact: Promotes creativity and fine motor skills, helps with recognition capabilities, nurtures awareness

activities.name: Christmas is here!
activities.explanation: Give your child a mini tree to decorate, help them to create a card, get outside to see christmas liights
activities.impact: Promotes creativity and fine motor skills, advances attention to details
